import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FaEdit, FaPlus } from 'react-icons/fa'; function ProductShowcasePage() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/products/').then((res) => setProducts(res.data)); }, []); return (
{/* Header */}

); } export default ProductShowcasePage;
